name: clRNG
tagline: an OpenCL based software library containing random number generation functions
body:
### [HTML documentation](http://clMathLibraries.github.io/clRNG/htmldocs/index.html)

The link shown above takes you to the HTML documentation for the library. The documentation was automatically generated using doxygen. Use this documentation to understand how to use the library for random number generation using OpenCL.

### [Design documentation](http://clMathLibraries.github.io/clRNG/docs/index.html)
 
The link shown above takes you to a PDF based document that details the design of API and other aspects of the library. This may be interesting for you if you want to provide feedback to the library designers on the API or other areas.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
